籤詩版本二:
Sabole e benya hamonate ha e tsoa ka lebokoseng, empa ha e hohele lerole ka lebokoseng.
Joale ke na le motho ea khabane, ea nang le bolaoli le matla, 'me bohle ba nthata
詩意:
Hexagram ena e emela sabole e tsoang ka lebokoseng.
Ntho e ngoe le e ngoe e matla ebile e matla.
解曰: Sabole e tsoa ka lebokoseng. E khabane ka lik'hilomithara tse likete. Tataiso e kgabane. Tsohle di ntle.
籤詩故事一:
◇Zhao Zilong o boloka Adou
Nakong ea Mebuso e Meraro, Zhao Yun, lebitso la tlhompho Zilong, e ne e le letsoalloa la Changshan. Qalong, o ne a itšetlehile ka Yuan Shao, eaba o latela Liu (Bei), morena oa pele oa Western Shu.
Ka nako eo, Cao Cao o ne a batla ho ea ka boroa ho Nōka ea Yangtze. O ile a boela a hlōloa Dangyang 'me litho tsa lelapa la hae li arohane. Zhao Yun o ile a kopana le Mofumahali Wei (Mofumahali Liu Bei) tlas'a lerako la lefatše.
Mofumahali o ile a beha mora oa hae Adou (mora oa Liu Bei, Liu Chan) tlhokomelong ea Zhao Yun. Zhao Yun o ile a fa mofumahali pere eo, empa mofumahali eo a hana ho e amohela eaba o itahlela ka selibeng eaba oa shoa.
Ka mor'a hore Zhao Yun a lle le ho pata mosali oa hae, o ile a haka Adou 'me a loana tsela ea hae ea ho tsoa thibella.
聖意: Rapella mahlohonolo ka tlung ea hau le lehae la hau, rapella phaello ea lichelete, mahlohonolo khoebong, lenyalo le letle, basali ba tsamaeang ka maoto, liboko tsa silika tsa Chiti, tšenyo ea mehlape ea pele ea botšelela, batho ba lahlehileng, linyeoe tsa sechaba, ho falla, thepa e lahlehileng, mafu a boroa, ho khutla. litakatso tsa khale, mahlohonolo a lithaba le mabitla
第X籤: Ba mashome a mabeli a metso e robong ba hapile lotho
